thread.title: Manchester Car Parking Comparison Site Launched To Reduce The Cost Of Airport Parking
thread.title_full: Manchester Car Parking Comparison Site Launched To Reduce The Cost Of Airport Parking

author: prbuzz.com
title: Manchester Car Parking Comparison Site Launched To Reduce The Cost Of Airport Parking
text:
Consumers in the UK are wasting money by not checking car-parking prices at Manchester Airport and other airports around the UK according to travel experts.
UK Airport Car Parks has launched a car parking comparison tool to allow people looking to park their cars at Manchester Airport and other airports around the UK to find the best deal.
In a recent report, it was found that holidaymakers in the UK pay more for their parking than most other countries around the world. The report made big news in the media due to the amount of money that is being wasted each year. UK Airport Car Parks comparison tool allows a person to enter the details of where they are flying from and the date, and then they will receive all the best prices on their airport car parking needs.
According to Chris Fryer from UK Airport Car Parks, by spending less than one minute holidaymakers could save money by using their car parking comparison tool. ( http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/search-carparks )
Chris Fryer said: “It takes no longer than one minute to save money on airport parking. By simply entering the details into our airport parking price checker, consumers could be surprised at how much they could save.”
The comparison tool has received positive reviews and according to the reviews by consumers who have used it and according to UK Airport Car Parks, people could save up to 60% off the normal price.
This airport comparison tool has been seen as an important step forward in helping reduce the cost of parking a car an airport in the UK.
To learn more about saving money on Airport car parking at Manchester Airport, Gatwick Airport, and other airports, please visit http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/car-parking/manchester or to learn the secrets in finding cheap easyJet flights, please visit http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/blog/how-to-find-cheap-easyjet-flights-for-your-holiday
About Ukairportcarparks.co.uk
Ukairportcarparks.co.uk provides holidaymakers with a trusted and affordable airport parking, airport hotel and airport lounge solution.
